Posted By: Arachibutyrophobia (9/29/2012 11:22:53 PM)

posts.post_content:
Wow, back then in my casual group this would have been *the* land card.  
I'm surprised it doesn't require blue mana, but that makes it all the more interesting.  
  
This effect really can have an impact, and it's a huge advantage to have it as part of your mana base instead of being required to add cards to your deck to do that job (like [Whispersilk Cloak](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Whispersilk Cloak) for example).  
  
The activation cost requires quite some mana, but if you're playing creatures that have powerful triggers when they get through, it will be worth the cost. Especially if those creatures have otherwise no evasion and would just get blocked to death.  
  
It's definitely a card i'd consider putting into a deck with [Phage the Untouchable](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phage the Untouchable) or [Vraska the Unseen](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vraska the Unseen).
posts.html:
Wow, back then in my casual group this would have been the land card.
I'm surprised it doesn't require blue mana, but that makes it all the more interesting.

This effect really can have an impact, and it's a huge advantage to have it as part of your mana base instead of being required to add cards to your deck to do that job (like Whispersilk Cloak for example).

The activation cost requires quite some mana, but if you're playing creatures that have powerful triggers when they get through, it will be worth the cost. Especially if those creatures have otherwise no evasion and would just get blocked to death.

It's definitely a card i'd consider putting into a deck with Phage the Untouchable or Vraska the Unseen.

posts.post_content:
See [Vraska the Unseen](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vraska the Unseen)'s Ultimate, my job here is done.   
  
4/5  
  
p.s. Also a good mana sink for when a fast aggressive deck gets flooded. [Goblin Lackey](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Lackey) anyone? How about making [Precinct Captain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Precinct Captain) unblock-able when he's soulbonded with [Silverblade Paladin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Silverblade Paladin)? Make my 8/8 token unblock-able? Don't mind if I do. How about make [Sublime Archangel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sublime Archangel) or [Thromok the Insatiable](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thromok the Insatiable) unblockable? This card is more then playable.
